description:
Big whitewater demands a secure, burly sprayskirt. The Ace holds on like a junkyard dog through creeking and advanced moves. Its Kevlar-reinforced panels stand up to the abuse of boat-over-boat rescues. The double-stitched rand is more durable and stretchy, providing a solid defense against incoming water.

  • Construction combines 4mm diamond-grid neoprene on the deck with 4mm Kevlar abrasion side panels
  • 2mm neoprene tunnel is super stretchy and creates a smooth seal
  • Cockpit seal uses smart stretch natural rubber with a ribbed cross section
  • Updated rand is double-stitched for improved durability and stretch
  • Silicone printing adds grip on the interior
  • Nylon pull loop
name: Level Six Ace Sprayskirt Large Cockpit - Unisex
